name: WinClassic: Fix for Tab Bar Background
description:
For Firefox on Windows Classic and Aero Basic themes.
Replaces the ugly Tab-bar background when tabs are in titlebar with the native Windows titlebar look.
Compatible with Australis (Firefox 29).
additional_info:
(13/12/2013) Code optimization.
(20/11/2013) Compatibility with Australis.
(25/03/2011) Tab bar in Aero Basic looked "dirty", so I fixed it.
